death_place.en: New York City, New York, United States

description.zh-cn: 美籍华裔物理学家，在核物理学领域卓有贡献，被誉为“中国的居里夫人”、“物理研究的第一女士”。她在实验上验证了宇称不守恒，并参与了曼哈顿计划。
description.en: A Chinese-American experimental physicist who made significant contributions in the field of nuclear physics. Known as the 'First Lady of Physics', she is best known for conducting the Wu experiment, which proved that parity is not conserved. She also worked on the Manhattan Project.

description.zh-cn: 华裔美国物理学家，吴健雄的丈夫，中华民国第一任大总统袁世凯的孙子。
description.en: A Chinese-American physicist, husband of Chien-Shiung Wu, and grandson of Yuan Shikai, the first president of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 物理学家，吴健雄与袁家骝的儿子。
description.en: Physicist, son of Chien-Shiung Wu and Luke Chia-Liu Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄的父亲，创办了明德学校。
description.en: Father of Chien-Shiung Wu, founder of the Ming-De School.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Chien-Shiung Wu.

description.zh-cn: 美国物理学家，诺贝尔物理学奖得主，吴健雄在加州大学伯克利分校的博士导师。
description.en: American physicist and Nobel laureate, doctoral advisor to Chien-Shiung Wu at the University of California, Berkeley.

description.zh-cn: 华裔美国物理学家，诺贝尔物理学奖得主。他与杨振宁共同提出宇称不守恒理论，并请求吴健雄进行实验验证。
description.en: Chinese-American physicist and Nobel laureate. He and Chen-Ning Yang proposed the theory of parity non-conservation and asked Chien-Shiung Wu to verify it experimentally.

description.zh-cn: 华裔物理学家，诺贝尔物理学奖得主。他与李政道共同提出宇称不守恒理论。
description.en: Chinese physicist and Nobel laureate. He and Tsung-Dao Lee proposed the theory of parity non-conservation.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理学家，吴健雄在国立中央大学的导师。
description.en: Chinese physicist, mentor to Chien-Shiung Wu at National Central University.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理学家，吴健雄在中央研究院的导师，鼓励她去海外求学。
description.en: Chinese physicist, mentor to Chien-Shiung Wu at Academia Sinica, who encouraged her to study abroad.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄的叔父，资助了她的留学经费，后在文化大革命中被迫害致死。
description.en: Chien-Shiung Wu's uncle, who funded her overseas studies and was later persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国学者、思想家，曾任中国公学校长，吴健雄在该校任教时曾旁听其课程。
description.en: Chinese scholar and philosopher, who served as president of China Public School where Chien-Shiung Wu attended his lectures while teaching.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理。1973年接见了回国访问的吴健雄，并就其亲人在文革中的遭遇致歉。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China. He met with Chien-Shiung Wu during her visit to China in 1973 and apologized for the persecution her relatives suffered during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 美国理论物理学家，与默里·盖尔曼共同提出矢量流守恒猜想。
description.en: American theoretical physicist who, along with Murray Gell-Mann, proposed the conserved vector current hypothesis.

description.zh-cn: 美国物理学家，与理查德·费曼共同提出矢量流守恒猜想。
description.en: American physicist who, along with Richard Feynman, proposed the conserved vector current hypothesis.

description.zh-cn: 美籍华裔物理学家，诺贝尔物理学奖得主，吴健雄学术基金会的共同创办人。
description.en: Chinese-American physicist, Nobel laureate, and a co-founder of the Wu Chien-Shiung Academic Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 台湾化学家，诺贝尔化学奖得主，吴健雄学术基金会的共同创办人。
description.en: Taiwanese chemist, Nobel laureate, and a co-founder of the Wu Chien-Shiung Academic Foundation.

nodes.id: 国立中央大学 (大陆时期)

zh-cn: 国立中央大学 (大陆时期)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆时期的一所大学，吴健雄于1930年至1934年在此求学。
description.en: A university in mainland China during the Republic of China era, where Chien-Shiung Wu studied from 1930 to 1934.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国加州的一所公立研究型大学，吴健雄在此获得博士学位。
description.en: A public research university in California, USA, where Chien-Shiung Wu earned her Ph.D.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约市的一所私立研究型大学，吴健雄在此度过了她大部分的学术生涯。
description.en: A private research university in New York City, USA, where Chien-Shiung Wu spent most of her academic career.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，由美国主导的一项研发首枚原子弹的军事计划。吴健雄参与了其中的铀浓缩项目。
description.en: A research and development undertaking during World War II, led by the United States, that produced the first nuclear weapons. Chien-Shiung Wu participated in its uranium enrichment program.

description.zh-cn: 基本粒子物理学中的一条定律，指在弱相互作用中宇称不守恒。该理论由李政道和杨振宁提出，并由吴健雄通过实验验证。
description.en: A law in particle physics stating that parity is not conserved in weak interactions. The theory was proposed by Tsung-Dao Lee and Chen-Ning Yang and experimentally verified by Chien-Shiung Wu.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年间在中华人民共和国发生的一场政治运动。吴健雄的亲属在此期间受到迫害。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China from 1966 to 1976. Relatives of Chien-Shiung Wu were persecuted during this period.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国江苏省太仓市，是吴健雄的出生地。
description.en: A town in Taicang, Jiangsu, China, the birthplace of Chien-Shiung Wu.

description.zh-cn: 由吴健雄的父亲吴仲裔为女童创办的学校，吴健雄在此接受小学教育。
description.en: A school for girls founded by Chien-Shiung Wu's father, Wu Zhongyi, where she received her elementary education.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄曾在此任教的学校，时任校长为胡适。
description.en: A school where Chien-Shiung Wu taught, with Hu Shih as the president at the time.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄在本科毕业后曾在此进修并担任助教。
description.en: A university where Chien-Shiung Wu pursued further studies and worked as a teaching assistant after her undergraduate degree.

nodes.id: 中央研究院物理研究所

zh-cn: 中央研究院物理研究所
中央研究院物理研究所

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄在赴美留学前曾在此担任研究员。
description.en: An institute where Chien-Shiung Wu worked as a researcher before studying in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国马萨诸塞州的一所女子学院，吴健雄于二战期间曾在此任教。
description.en: A women's college in Massachusetts, USA, where Chien-Shiung Wu taught during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国新泽西州的一所私立研究型大学，吴健雄曾在此指导海军军官。
description.en: A private research university in New Jersey, USA, where Chien-Shiung Wu instructed naval officers.

description.zh-cn: 由理查德·费曼与默里·盖尔曼提出的物理学猜想，后由吴健雄于1963年通过实验证实。
description.en: A hypothesis in physics proposed by Richard Feynman and Murray Gell-Mann, which was experimentally confirmed by Chien-Shiung Wu in 1963.

description.zh-cn: 1995年由杨振宁、李政道、丁肇中、李远哲四位诺贝尔奖得主在台湾发起创立的学术基金会。
description.en: An academic foundation established in Taiwan in 1995, initiated by Nobel laureates Chen-Ning Yang, Tsung-Dao Lee, Samuel C. C. Ting, and Yuan T. Lee.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄与袁家骝于1942年5月30日结婚。
description.en: Chien-Shiung Wu and Luke Chia-Liu Yuan married on May 30, 1942.

description.zh-cn: 袁纬承是吴健雄的儿子。
description.en: Vincent Yuan is the son of Chien-Shiung Wu.

description.zh-cn: 袁纬承是袁家骝的儿子。
description.en: Vincent Yuan is the son of Luke Chia-Liu Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄是吴仲裔的女儿。
description.en: Chien-Shiung Wu is the daughter of Wu Zhongyi.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄是樊复华的女儿。
description.en: Chien-Shiung Wu is the daughter of Fan Fuhua.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄于1912年5月31日出生于江苏省太仓县浏河镇。
description.en: Chien-Shiung Wu was born in Liuhe, Taicang, Jiangsu on May 31, 1912.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄在明德学校接受小学教育。
description.en: Chien-Shiung Wu received her elementary education at the Ming-De School.

relationships.target: 国立中央大学 (大陆时期)

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄于1930年至1934年就读于国立中央大学，主修物理。
description.en: Chien-Shiung Wu studied at National Central University from 1930 to 1934, majoring in physics.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄于1940年6月在加州大学伯克利分校获得哲学博士学位。
description.en: Chien-Shiung Wu received her Ph.D. from the University of California, Berkeley in June 1940.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄在加州大学伯克利分校攻读博士学位期间，师从欧内斯特·劳伦斯。
description.en: While pursuing her doctorate at the University of California, Berkeley, Chien-Shiung Wu studied under Ernest Lawrence.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄在国立中央大学求学期间，她的导师是施士元教授。
description.en: During her studies at National Central University, Chien-Shiung Wu's advisor was Professor Shi Shiyuan.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄在中央研究院的导师是顾静薇教授。
description.en: Chien-Shiung Wu's advisor at Academia Sinica was Professor Gu Jingwei.

position.zh-cn: 副研究员、副教授、正教授、米海洛·卜平物理学教授
position.en: Associate Research Scientist, Associate Professor, Professor, Michael I. Pupin Professor of Physics

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄自二战结束后一直在哥伦比亚大学任教，直至1981年退休。
description.en: Chien-Shiung Wu taught at Columbia University from the end of World War II until her retirement in 1981.

description.zh-cn: 1944年3月，吴健雄加入位于哥伦比亚大学的曼哈顿计划下属实验室，参与铀浓缩项目。
description.en: In March 1944, Chien-Shiung Wu joined a Manhattan Project laboratory at Columbia University, participating in the uranium enrichment program.

description.zh-cn: 吴仲裔为女童创办了明德学校。
description.en: Wu Zhongyi founded the Ming-De School for girls.

description.zh-cn: 与杨振宁共同对宇称守恒定律的普适性产生质疑，并提出了弱相互作用中宇称不守恒的理论。
description.en: Together with Chen-Ning Yang, questioned the universality of the law of parity conservation and proposed the theory of parity non-conservation in weak interactions.

description.zh-cn: 与李政道共同对宇称守恒定律的普适性产生质疑，并提出了弱相互作用中宇称不守恒的理论。
description.en: Together with Tsung-Dao Lee, questioned the universality of the law of parity conservation and proposed the theory of parity non-conservation in weak interactions.

description.zh-cn: 通过吴氏实验在实验上首次验证了弱相互作用中的宇称不守恒。
description.en: Experimentally verified parity non-conservation in weak interactions for the first time through the Wu experiment.

description.zh-cn: 关于宇称不守恒的理论工作使李政道（与杨振宁）获得了1957年的诺贝尔物理学奖。
description.en: The theoretical work on parity non-conservation led to Tsung-Dao Lee (with Chen-Ning Yang) receiving the 1957 Nobel Prize in Physics.

description.zh-cn: 关于宇称不守恒的理论工作使杨振宁（与李政道）获得了1957年的诺贝尔物理学奖。
description.en: The theoretical work on parity non-conservation led to Chen-Ning Yang (with Tsung-Dao Lee) receiving the 1957 Nobel Prize in Physics.

description.zh-cn: 请求吴健雄对宇称不守恒理论进行实验验证。
description.en: Requested Chien-Shiung Wu to perform an experimental test of the parity non-conservation theory.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄的叔父吴琢之在文化大革命中受到迫害而身故。
description.en: Chien-Shiung Wu's uncle, Wu Zhuozhi, was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄父亲吴仲裔的坟墓在文化大革命中遭到毁坏。
description.en: The grave of Chien-Shiung Wu's father, Wu Zhongyi, was destroyed during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄母亲樊复华的坟墓在文化大革命中遭到毁坏。
description.en: The grave of Chien-Shiung Wu's mother, Fan Fuhua, was destroyed during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 1973年，吴健雄回国访问时受到周恩来接见，周恩来就其亲人在文革中的遭遇向她致歉。
description.en: In 1973, when Chien-Shiung Wu visited China, she was received by Zhou Enlai, who apologized for the persecution her relatives suffered during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 吴健雄在中国公学任教时，曾旁听时任校长胡适的课程。
description.en: While teaching at China Public School, Chien-Shiung Wu attended lectures by the school's president, Hu Shih.

description.zh-cn: 与默里·盖尔曼共同提出矢量流守恒猜想。
description.en: Proposed the conserved vector current hypothesis with Murray Gell-Mann.

description.zh-cn: 与理查德·费曼共同提出矢量流守恒猜想。
description.en: Proposed the conserved vector current hypothesis with Richard Feynman.

description.zh-cn: 于1963年研究并证实了矢量流守恒猜想。
description.en: In 1963, researched and confirmed the conserved vector current hypothesis.

description.zh-cn: 1995年，杨振宁与李政道、丁肇中、李远哲共同发起创立吴健雄学术基金会。
description.en: In 1995, Chen-Ning Yang, along with Tsung-Dao Lee, Samuel C. C. Ting, and Yuan T. Lee, co-founded the Wu Chien-Shiung Academic Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 1995年，李政道与杨振宁、丁肇中、李远哲共同发起创立吴健雄学术基金会。
description.en: In 1995, Tsung-Dao Lee, along with Chen-Ning Yang, Samuel C. C. Ting, and Yuan T. Lee, co-founded the Wu Chien-Shiung Academic Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 1995年，丁肇中与杨振宁、李政道、李远哲共同发起创立吴健雄学术基金会。
description.en: In 1995, Samuel C. C. Ting, along with Chen-Ning Yang, Tsung-Dao Lee, and Yuan T. Lee, co-founded the Wu Chien-Shiung Academic Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 1995年，李远哲与杨振宁、李政道、丁肇中共同发起创立吴健雄学术基金会。
description.en: In 1995, Yuan T. Lee, along with Chen-Ning Yang, Tsung-Dao Lee, and Samuel C. C. Ting, co-founded the Wu Chien-Shiung Academic Foundation.
